M

main(String[]) - Static method in class testing.ManualTester
 
ManualTester - Class in testing
Main class of the PicturePlay program, detects the chosen option between: -e: Standard encoding option, it requires a picture to receive the message and a message; -d: Standard decoding option, it require a picture containing a message to decode; -me: Mass encoding option, encodes all png pictures in the chosen folder tree, it requires a startfolder, a maximum depth and a message to encode; -md: Mass decoding option, decodes all png pictures in the chosen folder tree, it requires a startfolder and a depth; -mule: Mass encoding multiple message option, encodes a series of messages in the png pictures detected in the chosen folder tree, it keeps going until it runs out of messages or pictures.
ManualTester() - Constructor for class testing.ManualTester
 
MultEncoder - Class in threads
This class utilizes strict thread synchronization enforced by a turn system in order to recursively instantiate new threads on itself, which will run one by one, analyze the contents of the folder they are started in and then, if any png file is found, a steganographer is istantiated on it in order to encode one of the messages.
MultEncoder(String[]) - Constructor for class threads.MultEncoder
Standard constructor of MultEncoder, it checks whether the number of arguments is correct for function.
